java/liquibase/change/DropColumnChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.DropColumnStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.ReorganizeTableStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00011 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.*;
00016 
00020 public class DropColumnChange extends AbstractChange {
00021 
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String tableName;
00024     private String columnName;
00025 
00026     public DropColumnChange() {
00027         super("dropColumn", "Drop Column");
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getColumnName() {
00031         return columnName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00035         this.columnName = columnName;
00036     }
00037 
00038 
00039     public String getSchemaName() {
00040         return schemaName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00044         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getTableName() {
00048         return tableName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00052         this.tableName = tableName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00056         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00057         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00058 
00059         statements.add(new DropColumnStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnName()));
00060         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00061             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName()));
00062         }
00063         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00064     }
00065 
00066     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00067         return "Column " + getTableName() + "." + getColumnName() + " dropped";
00068     }
00069 
00070     public Element createNode (Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00071         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropColumn");
00072         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00073             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00074         }
00075 
00076         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00077         element.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00078         return element;
00079     }
00080 
00081     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00082 
00083 
00084         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00085 
00086         Column column = new Column();
00087         column.setTable(table);
00088         column.setName(columnName);
00089 
00090         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00091 
00092     }
00093 
00094 }
